mapper.insert: insert into article(member_id, title, content) values (#{member.id}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update article set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, last_modified_date=now() where article_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.article_id, a.title, a.content, a.created_date, m.member_id, m.nickname from article a join member m on a.member_id = m.member_id where a.article_id = #{articleId}
